name: Apple Picker Prototype
description:
How to play:

  • Move the baskets and catch the falling apples.
  • If you miss an apple three times, the game will restart.

Controls:

  • Use the mouse to move the baskets side to side.
  • ESC to pause.
  • Based on the Apple Picker Prototype from the book "Introduction to Game Design, Prototyping and Development" by Jeremy Gibson.
